name: Gyxon's First Game from Tutorial
description:
Assets such as arts and audios are belong to GamePlusJames , Suikoden II , and Terraria.

you can make this game using Unity Editor by watching GamePlusJames's channel

Here is the link https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLiyfvmtjWC_X6e0EYLPczO9tNCkm2dzkm .

I only uploaded this game just for testing itch.io for future purposes since I'm new here!

Follow me, and I'll be making more games made by myself. Thank you!
